original_text: Then all the people wanted to throw stones at Joshua and Caleb to kill them. But the glory of the Lord appeared over the Tent of Meeting. All the Israelites could see that.
korean_text: 온 회중이 그들을 돌로 치려 하는데 그 때에 여호와의 영광이 회막에서 이스라엘 모든 자손에게 나타나시니라

sentences.original_text: Then all the people wanted to throw stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 모든 백성들이 돌을 던지고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: at Joshua and Caleb to kill them
But the glory of the Lord appeared
All the Israelites could see that
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 이스라엘 사람들은 그것을 볼 수 있었습니다
